title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 62.2 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 62.2 - General

State Regulations
(a) No sheep, goats, llamas or deer shall be brought into New York State except in compliance
with this Part. (b) No sheep, goats, llamas or deer affected with any infectious, contagious or communicable
disease shall be brought into New York State except with written permission of
the New York Department State of Agriculture and Markets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
62.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
